description:
Momoko Sakura is an elementary school student who likes popular idol Momoe Yamaguchi and mangas. She is often called "Chibi Maruko-chan" due to her young age and small size. She lives together with her parents, her grandparents and her elder sister in a little town. In school, she has many friends with whom she studies and plays together everyday, including her close pal, Tama-chan; the student committee members, Maruo-kun and Migiwa-san; and the B-class trio: `little master` Hanawa-kun, Hamaji-Bu Taro and Sekiguchi-kun. This is a fun-loving and enjoyable anime that portrays the simple things in life.
(Source: ANN)

Maruko thinks about her friendship with Tamae when her dad gets in a fight with his best friend. Later, Maruko and her school friends all go to Hanawa`s house to learn to play darts (and get yummy snacks).

It`s too hot at home, so Maruko asks her mom if they can get an A/C, and imgines her life with ten billion yen. Her dad buys her rhinoceros beetles, which leads to a fight with her sister.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: "Atsui Natsu o Ie de Sugoshita Ichinichi" no Maki
At Home on a Hot Summer Day
「暑い夏を家ですごした一日」の巻

REGULAR.description:
The bell crickets Maruko got last year multiplied a lot this year, and they`re causing noise problems at home. Maruko tries to get rid of them, but...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: "Suzumushi ga Urusai" no Maki
Bell Crickets Are Noisy
「すず虫がうるさい」の巻

REGULAR.description:
Maru-chan finds it really REALLY hard to get up in the mornings.  For her New Year`s Resolution, she decides to not oversleep and buys an alarm clock. Can Maruko really become an early riser?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: "Maru-chan: Mezamashidokei o Kau" no Maki
Maru-chan Buys an Alarm Clock
「まるちゃん 目ざまし時計を買う」の巻

REGULAR.description:
When the Sakura family receives a luxurious gift of puffer fish, Mom plans to make a hot pot for the whole family. But Sakura learns about the dangers of puffer fish and is determined to protect her family...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: "Maruko, Nabemono Sawagi" no Maki
Maruko Makes a Scene over Hot Pot
「まる子, 鍋モノさわぎ」の巻

REGULAR.description:
It`s too cold outside, so Maruko turns down Tama-chan`s invitation to play outside. Later that day, she has to handle being cold again. But she is too lazy to deal with it, and...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: "Maruko, Samusa ni Makeru" no Maki
Maruko Gives In to the Cold
「まる子, 寒さに負ける」の巻

REGULAR.description:
Maruko comes up with a new game to play with Grandpa. Later, Yamane thinks hard to come up with a nickname for himself.
Source: crunchyroll
